mapper.insert: insert into tb_user(user_ID, user_PW, user_NICK,joined_at, user_type) values (#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_nick},sysdate,'N')
mapper.select: SELECT case when count(*)>0 then 1 else 0 end result FROM tb_user WHERE user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_user SET user_pw=#{user_pw}, user_nick=#{user_nick} WHERE user_id=#{user_id}
